firstParagraph: I graduated from State Polytechnic of Malang (Polinema), majoring in Information Technology. And doing my full-time at
secondParagraph: Lots of modern technologies are being pumped out these days, and Front-End Technology is no exception. The urge to learn and try these trending technologies is huge. Even so, after having some trials on various IT field, I had my focus on learning Front-End Development on 2020 and have been learning it ever since.
thirdParagraph: In this website, i'll actively adding collection to my handful projects and writing blogs. With writing, I'll be able to document my journey of exploration, experiences, as well as learnings. Besides, I'd like to share my findings and exploration on IT-related stuffs along the way.
title: About Me

description.job: Enhanced customer engagement and loyalty by implementing innovative gamification features in the Erafone Website, driving 16,000 active users and rewarding 36% with Eraspace points.
Revamped Eraspace's login and registration screens with a focus on user experience and responsiveness, leveraging Tailwind CSS and React Hook Form.
Elevated B2C e-commerce for Eraspace.com, iBox.co.id, JDSports, Wellings, and more by crafting dynamic online shopping experiences with Next.js and Typescript
Integrated RESTful APIs using Axios and Tanstack Query, facilitating seamless collaboration with the dedicated backend microservices team.

Streamlined catalog management for a major e-commerce player by migrating from Magento to a custom application, reduced subscription costs for B2C channels and boosted efficiency through strategic optimization efforts.
Partnered with product owners, QA, and vendors to develop and launch internal applications for Erajaya subsidiaries, managing inventory, retail flows, discounts, and more.
Reviewed 400+ submissions in Front-End Learning Path. Gives feedback and advice on how students can improve their codes more. Rated 4.9 out of 5 in Front-End Learning Path.
Regularly sharing with other reviewer peers to give better feedback to the students as well as discussing latest tech trends in Front-End Development

Utilizing IntersectionObserver API to detect user scroll on Salyns Landing Page. Used to animate statistics of active user growth, the overall amount of transcribed audio, and the accuracy of the product.
Implemented SWR (Stale-While-Revalidate) to ensure real-time data being rendered in the user dashboard while transcribing the audio to text
Used Jira for project communication
Optimized Git workflow and Github Actions for CI/CD
Developed Web application with React JS, Next JS, Zustand, and Chakra UI

data.pointTitle: Studi Independen Machine Learning & Front-End Developer

description.job: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to develop a predictive vaccination rate model using machine learning.
Contributed to data cleaning and preparation to optimize model performance. Integrated Machine Learning Algorithms to projects with Python, Keras, and Tensorflow
Developed reusable components to streamline development and maintain code quality by leveraging an optimal use of React JS
Deployed the frontend on Netlify for optimal performance and accessibility. While the machine learning model on Heroku to ensure scalability and reliability.
Implemented MockAPI to streamline frontend development and accelerate project timelines.
Upgraded the legacy codebase from CSS to Sass, enhancing code readability and maintainability.
Automated end-to-end testing with Cypress to identify and fix issues early in the development process.
